issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] COUNT(*) schema name is COUNT(UInt8)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10170](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10170). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, the query `COUNT(*)` is being converted to `COUNT(1)` during logical planning, which causes the field's name to be `COUNT(1)`, not `COUNT(*)`

 One idea is to delay the map for the physical planning, when naming is no longer an issue.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10170?focusedCommentId=17332298) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-datafusion/issues/104
